1.content:
Jon was walking in the street when he found a golden spider. Seeing if the spider was real. When he touch it a shock came through his finger. Then a voice came to his head and said "This spider will allow you to possess many people as you want by using your mind as a thread and attach it to others, you could use it any way you want."


When Jon heard this he has an evil grin on his face imaging what could he do with it.
1.title: It Started

11.content: Before he can try using it aimlessly he got to test it first to see it was real. First he try to move the spider by will. He thought right the spider move right. "So far so good" he thought. Next he if could see what the spider saw. He thought hard then able to see himself. "OK then now to see how far it can go." The spider left and Jon went home
11.title: testing

111.content:
The next morning while Jon was a sleep the spider came back and move into his room. When he wakes up he saw the spider was on top of his face. Then Jon freaks out but try to keep it quiet.

Now he need to test it on a person
111.title: the next morning

info.brief_description: jon find a gem with a golden spider with the ability to attach your mind in others.
info.description:
jon find a golden spider that he could control at will. the spider has the power to use his mind as a thread and attaches to other peoples as many he want. when the spider attach it thread to a person jon then can possess that person as well many others at the same time with his body being the main center.


jon is a 18 years old teen that graduate highschool. who still live with his family whose. he is 5'10.


Type or write in anything you want as long it related to the story. Don't end the story keep it going. Use proper writing or typing not like text message.
